casebody.data:
HANS HINRICHS, Inc., Appellee, v. AMERICAN MALTING COMPANY, Appellant. No. 43. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 7, 1938. Otterbourg, Steindler & Houston, of New York City (Arnold A. Jaffe, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. ■ Saul Hammer, of New York City, for appellee.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
